typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'dccontainer',
	fileName: 'dept.csv',
	columnDelimiter: '|',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> ReadFromCsv
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document') ~> ReadDepTableFromCosmos
ReadFromCsv, ReadDepTableFromCosmos lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(ERROR_FUNCTION(''), true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
